channel.title: CVE Feed for RedNao -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RedNao -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-29820|2024-03-27T06:54:37.016Z -- RedNao -- PDF Builder for WPForms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in RedNao PDF Builder for WPForms allows Stored XSS.This issue affects PDF Builder for WPForms: from n/a through 1.2.88.

item.title: CVE-2024-33593|2024-04-29T10:09:06.630Z -- RedNao -- Smart Forms
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in RedNao Smart Forms.This issue affects Smart Forms: from n/a through 2.6.91.

item.title: CVE-2024-31940|2024-04-15T09:15:47.045Z -- RedNao -- Extra Product Options Builder for WooCommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in RedNao Extra Product Options Builder for WooCommerce.This issue affects Extra Product Options Builder for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.2.104.
